text: Hi! How are you doing today? Would you be interested today in making a donation to a charity?
Which charity would that be?
The charity we're taking donations for is save the children!
I've seen a lot of commercials about them, but never did a lot of research about them.
They are actually really great. They provide help to children all across the globe and stand up for children's rights.
I know some charities only give a small percentage of donations to children and the rest go to their employees wages. Do they?
I thought that too at first, but luckily save the children is a non-governmental charity, so no one is sticking their hands into the pot.
Thats good, I see they are ready to help out with the hurricane in Hawaii for the kids.
Yes! You have to think about how helpless children can be. Every penny can make a huge difference even if it doesn't feel like it.
Do you regularly try to help the organization yourself?
I don't personally work for save the children, but I myself have donated several times to the charity. I feel confident that my money goes to the right places.
Yes, I like to help whenever I can when it comes to children. They are helpless.
That's great! So do you think you'd be willing to make a donation?
Do you make donations on line or mail it in?
You can actually donate directly
Where, on their website?
I'm sorry my last message was cut off. You can actually make a donation directly from this task!
Ok, I would like to. Maybe ten dollars I can do.
That would be an incredible donation that could really go a super long way for save the children!
Ok, I will definitely help out.
Thank you so much for your generosity. On behalf of Save The Children, THANK YOU! you should be prompted on a following screen to donate and you can enter your donation there :) Have a great day!
